lead_paragraph: The Bengals have a bit of a running back controversy with Giovani Bernard taking much of Jeremy Hill’s playing time in Week 2, but any mixture of the two backs is very likely to be productive.

headline.main: Cincinnati Bengals at Baltimore Ravens Preview

snippet: The Bengals have a bit of a running back controversy with Giovani Bernard taking much of Jeremy Hill’s playing time in Week 2, but any mixture of the two backs is very likely to be productive.
